---
listing:
  type: grid
  contents: posts/*.qmd
_quarto:
  tests:
    html:
      noErrors: true
      ensureHtmlElements:
        -
          - "a[href$='post-with-target.html'][target='_blank'][rel='noopener']"
          - "a[href$='post-without-target.html']:not([target]):not([rel])"
---

## Grid listing with target attribute test
